Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Taragon Road, opposite a dark pub called the Deft Hand.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side is a vine-covered wall which surrounds the village, and on the west side is a dim little pub known as the Deft Hand. It's not a real popular place because more people go in there than come out. The village militia seem to have a hands-off policy concerning the Deft Hand, as they never go in, except to collect a handful of gold and then leave.
